statements.select: SELECT T1.CRN_FORK_NO, T1.CRN_NO, CASE LAST_TASK_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '出库' END AS LAST_TASK_TYPE, CASE TASK_TYPE WHEN 'I' THEN '入库' WHEN 'M' THEN '移库' ELSE '出库' END AS TASK_TYPE, TASK_NO,FROM_BIN,TO_BIN, CASE STEP WHEN 0 THEN '无任务' WHEN 1 THEN '取放货' WHEN 2 THEN '移动至取货位' WHEN 3 THEN '取货' WHEN 4 THEN '移动至放货位' ELSE '放货' END STEP, CASE LOADING WHEN 1 THEN '有载' ELSE '无载' END AS LOADING, RETRY_COUNT, CASE CRN_MODE WHEN 1 THEN '自动' WHEN 2 THEN '半自动' WHEN 3 THEN '手动' ELSE '应急点动' END AS CRN_MODE, CASE STATUS WHEN 0 THEN '空闲' WHEN 1 THEN '执行中' WHEN 2 THEN '完成' ELSE '异常' END AS STATUS, ACT_POS_X, ACT_POS_Y,ACT_POS_Z,ACT_SPEED_X,ACT_SPEED_Y,ACT_SPEED_Z,RECORD_TIME, CASE WHEN T2.ERR_NAME IS NULL THEN '正常' ELSE T2.ERR_NAME END AS FAULT_NAME FROM PEM_CRN_FORK_STATUS T1 LEFT JOIN PSB_CRN_ERR T2 ON T1.FAULT_NO = T2.ERR_NO ORDER BY T1.CRN_NO,T1.CRN_FORK_NO
